channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: A resident called to complain that some left a household junk near her front door. Her worries is that the items were left infront of the lift blocking the fire exit. She suspected it may even be the estate cleaner that left it there but again, it may be someone moving out that packed and empty his/her flat and dumped it all there. It is not safe considering it is blocking the fire exit., 29th September
item.description:
The resident called to inform the office that someone left a junk/household rubbish in front of Flat 35 THE BECKERS, N16 7QX overnight. She think it may be the Estate cleaners or someone emptying their flat because of moving out. Her fear is that it is lef
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Rectory Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet
